comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: That is some mighty Chateau. Otherwise known as the Palace of Versailles. En Francaise: www.chateauversailles.fr/fr/ In English: www.chateauversailles.fr/en/

comment.author: 23203406@N06
comment._content: III Republique (1870-1940)! The president, in this time, had no more power than the queen in GB. And he was elected by the parlement (Deputies and senators together at Versailles) . From the dress of the people, il think the capture was done before the WW1. -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)
